Achievements.Name: Undead or Alive
Achievements.Description: Remember the time you scorned a woman.

Achievements.Name: Pistol for a Hundred Skeletons
Achievements.Description: Kill 18,675,309,000 Skeletons.

Achievements.Name: A Long Fall to Hell
Achievements.Description: Find a way to kill an undead puppet.

Achievements.Name: Great Balls of Fire
Achievements.Description: Survive an epic battle against a kite.

Achievements.Name: The Hidden Fortress
Achievements.Description: Crash into someone's house uninvited.

Achievements.Name: How The East Was Won
Achievements.Description: Possess a lush, full beard.

Achievements.Name: Seven Shooter
Achievements.Description: Defy laws of physics by shooting more than six enemies without reloading.

Achievements.Name: Money is the Best Medicine
Achievements.Description: Earn cash, not health, for every heart in an act.

Achievements.Name: Russian Chicken
Achievements.Description: In a shootout, play chicken with a bullet before shooting it.

Achievements.Name: Requiem for a Gunstringer
Achievements.Description: Walk amongst the dead.

Achievements.Name: Lonely Are The Dead
Achievements.Description: Face Death and live to tell the tale.

Achievements.Name: A Fistful of Revenge
Achievements.Description: Ride "Burrito" the Dog into the sunset.

Achievements.Name: The Great Wall of Vengeance
Achievements.Description: Ride a rocket over a battlefield.

Achievements.Name: The Canyon Runs Red
Achievements.Description: Fall thousands of feet without dying.

Achievements.Name: No Country for Old Barons
Achievements.Description: Carjack a stagecoach.

Achievements.Name: For A Few Gallons More
Achievements.Description: Take down Big Oil.

Achievements.Name: The Gunstringer Rides Again
Achievements.Description: Destroy the advertising plan of a small business.

Achievements.Name: Once Upon a Time in the West
Achievements.Description: End an artist's career.

Achievements.Name: The Bandit Sheriff
Achievements.Description: Close your bank account.

Achievements.Name: Stranger in New Orleans
Achievements.Description: Take Andrew Jackson to the Madam's district.

Achievements.Name: The Big Easy Reckoning
Achievements.Description: Get close and personal with the Madam.

Achievements.Name: Legend of the 8000 Samurai
Achievements.Description: Find the Great Wall of China in an unexpected place.

Achievements.Name: My Horse, A Gun, Your Lumberjack
Achievements.Description: Find a place to saw some logs.

Achievements.Name: The Brute and the Beast
Achievements.Description: See things that you will never be able to unsee.

Achievements.Name: Death Rides a Steamboat
Achievements.Description: Commit mass destruction with a paddleboat.

Achievements.Name: The Last Undead Boy Scout
Achievements.Description: Collect a gold medal, hardcore award, and 2P award in a single act.

Achievements.Name: Perfect Performance
Achievements.Description: Win gold medals in all acts of a single play.

Achievements.Name: Sellout
Achievements.Description: Buy an achievement from the bonus store.

Achievements.Name: The Lone Star
Achievements.Description: Finish an act while playing on Hardcore Mode.

Achievements.Name: Gold Medallist
Achievements.Description: Reach a Gold Medal score on a single act.

Achievements.Name: Why Would You Even Do This?
Achievements.Description: Complete an act with every single modifier enabled.

Achievements.Name: Big Spender
Achievements.Description: Purchase everything in the bonus store.

Achievements.Name: Strings of Steel
Achievements.Description: Beat every play in one session. On Hardcore Mode. Also, never die.

Achievements.Name: Awesomeness Detected
Achievements.Description: Do something really awesome.

Achievements.Name: Lucky Prize Winner
Achievements.Description: Find an achievement hidden in a piece of concept art.

Achievements.Name: Hundred Thousand Dollar Baby
Achievements.Description: Spend a whole chunk of money in the bonus store.

Achievements.Name: Perfectionist
Achievements.Description: Win a gold medal in every act of every play.

Achievements.Name: The Backwards Bandit
Achievements.Description: Complete a level with "Lefty Mode" enabled.

Achievements.Name: Hot Lead Pusher
Achievements.Description: Get a crazy high kill streak.

Achievements.Name: Turbo Deflation
Achievements.Description: Deflate the first boss in under 30 seconds.

Achievements.Name: No Insurance
Achievements.Description: Don't scratch the paint while piloting a paddleboat.

Achievements.Name: Took a Bullet for the Team
Achievements.Description: Take down the developers.

Achievements.Name: Two Hearts to Live
Achievements.Description: Complete all acts in a play without ever dropping to one heart.

Achievements.Name: Living Large in the Saddle
Achievements.Description: Hoard all the tacos and hearts in an act.

Achievements.Name: With a Little Help from a Friend
Achievements.Description: Complete an act with a friend.

Achievements.Name: What's Next?
Achievements.Description: Visit the Download Content screen to see what new content is available.

Achievements.Name: Tin Marksman
Achievements.Description: Shoot all the cans in the Prologue.

Achievements.Name: The Red Baron
Achievements.Description: Kill 100 enemies while strapped to a rocket in "The Great Wall of Vengeance".

Achievements.Name: Undead and Untouchable
Achievements.Description: Reach the end of "Requiem for a Gunstringer" without losing a single heart.

Achievements.Name: Back Seat Commentator
Achievements.Description: Listen to a different kind of narrator while you play.
